title: The Montgomery Chronicles Omnibus
description: This Omnibus version contains three books in The Montgomery Chronicles: 'The Fertile Vampire', 'The Reluctant Goddess', and 'Pranic, Pregnant, and Petrified'.The Montgomery Chronicles is the ongoing story of Marcie Montgomery, commercial insurance adjuster made vampire and... something more. Life, if you'll pardon the term, is nothing like she knew it. Now she has vampires out for her blood, witches in every corner (even her own family), and humans-only groups who have a weird idea of political correctness. Not to mention a slightly sarcastic dog.What's a self-respecting vampire to do?Seek refuge in a castle of course, one that holds its own secrets and is the home of Dan, former-Ranger, all around hottie, and man of mystery.
author: Karen Ranney
